title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Rep. Chip Roy, State Sen. Jerry Sonnenberg, & Siva Raj and Autumn Looijen | 3/11/21
description:
Parents Siva Raj & Autumn Looijen join to share how they’re successfully fighting against San Francisco’s school board. Colorado state Sen. Jerry Sonnenberg shares how his state has turned into a leftist playground, including a new bill that would practically form a "Ministry of Truth." Rep. Chip Roy gives us insight on the border crisis in Texas as the Biden administration continues to downplay it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Parents Siva Raj & Autumn Looijen join to share how they’re successfully fighting against San Francisco’s school board. Colorado state Sen. Jerry Sonnenberg shares how his state has turned into a leftist playground, including a new bill that would practically form a "Ministry of Truth." Rep. Chip Roy gives us insight on the border crisis in Texas as the Biden administration continues to downplay it.
